name: Faulks, Appellant, v. Unity Life and Accident Insurance Association of Syracuse
name_abbreviation: Faulks v. Unity Life & Accident Insurance Ass'n of Syracuse

judges: Before Schaffer, C. J.; Maxey, Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson and Parker; JJ.
parties: Faulks, Appellant, v. Unity Life and Accident Insurance Association of Syracuse.

opinions.text:
Pee Curiam,
The judgment entered in the court below is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Parry.
opinions.author: Pee Curiam,

attorneys: Edwin Fischer, with him Edward F. Hitchcock, for appellant.
casebody.head_matter:
Faulks, Appellant, v. Unity Life and Accident Insurance Association of Syracuse.
Argued December 2, 1942.
Before Schaffer, C. J.; Maxey, Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson and Parker; JJ.
Edwin Fischer, with him Edward F. Hitchcock, for appellant.
Robert B. Koff, for appellee.
January 29, 1943:
